Array: The tide brings trespassers to my realm...
We have come to free The Vespertine from your curse.
Oh, is this how landlubbers refer to my ship now?
Who cares! We are ending this now!
And so it is that my reign is challenged once more.
I am Stormcaller.
The sea of nightmare corrupts all, and in time, consumes all.
If you would try your luck make sure your aim is true...
FOR NOW THE STORM CALLS FOR YOU!
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!
Phew... We did it...
The tremors are too strong! We have to get out of here!
To the ship!
Aye, just throw <color=magic>this pearl</color> into the water where ye fought Stormcaller.
And here's a lil' something fer the fight. Best ov luck!
Need anything?
Okay, here goes nothing.
Garl was right. This scale will produce Magic Dew.
Let's go back to Mirth. Time for the great harvest.
We must hurry to Hydralion.
